div.p: Andes Central School District will be closed next week, March 23-27, 2020, due to the governor’s recommendation concerning COVID-19. Andes Central School District will...
Congratulations to the Andes Central students who attended the Regional Spelling Bee in Burke! 1st and 2nd place winners from our school advanced to yesterday's...

Reminder: Weekly learning packets will continue through the end of the school year for students. Please remember to turn in your student's packets when work has been completed. Please contact the school if you have any questions. Thank you.
Reminder: Andes Central School will not be providing meals on Friday, April 10th & Monday, April 13th due to the Easter Holiday. Have a safe & Happy Easter!
The SDHSAA made the decision that all remaining events for 2019-2020 school year have been cancelled due to the school closures/COVID-19.

Andes Central School will continue to provide meals for any child 18 years and younger through May 21st. We won't be providing meals on Friday, 04/10/20 and Monday, 04/13/20 for the Easter Holiday. Please contact the school with any questions.

Per the Governor's recommendation, Andes Central School will be closed through the rest of the school year due to COVID-19. We will continue to provide weekly learning packets that parents will need to return to the school each week. Packets will be provided through May 21st.

Andes Central School District
1001 High St
Lake Andes, SD 57356
Phone: 605-487-7671
Fax: 605-487-7287

div.h2: Important information from Andes Central School:

ul.li: Andes Central School District will be closed through the end of the school year, due to the governor’s recommendation concerning COVID-19.

Andes Central School District will continue the food service program through May 21, 2020 for any child 18 years old and younger from 11:30 am-12:00 pm. Breakfast and Lunch will be provided Monday-Friday. We won’t be serving meals on Good Friday and Easter Monday (April 10th & 13th). Families within city limits may pick up their meals at the main entrance of the school. Meals will be delivered to the Community Center in the White Swan Housing in Lake Andes. Those outside these locations within the district will need to contact the school by 4:00 pm for deliveries the next day. Deliveries will follow the paved roads on regular bus routes.

Andes Central School District will continue to provide weekly learning packets for students PK-12th grade through May 21, 2020, to be picked up by parents / students at the school from 11:30 am-3:00 pm in the main entrance. Please remember to return your student’s work when completed. Staff will be preparing packets weekly to be distributed. If your student has a library book, please also return to the school.
SDHSAA has cancelled the remaining athletic events for the 2019-2020 school year.

Parents will be able to contact their child’s teachers by phone or email only. Please call 487-7671 or staff emails are available under the directory which is located on the website and mobile app under Menu-Staff.
During this time and for the safety of staff, students, and parents, please do not go beyond the main entrance/lobby of the school.

For more information concerning COVID-19, please visit the following resources:
DOE https://doe.sd.gov/
State of SD https://sd.gov/
SDHSAA https://www.sdhsaa.com/
DOH https://doh.sd.gov/
CDC https://www.cdc.gov/
